response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its high value and potential impact on your endeavors, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This represents a substantial saving compared to its market value of $10,000, making it an attractive opportunity for you. I look forward to discussing how this product can contribute to your success. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
